Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: An experimental model of focal segmental glomerular sclerosis ( FSGS ) was developed in rats by the combined administration of puromycin - aminonucleoside ( AMNS ) and protamine sulfate ( PS ) .

Let's think step by step.

```
| Disease |
| --- |
| FSGS |
| puromycin - aminonucleoside (AMNS) |
| protamine sulfate (PS) |
```
In this paragraph, "focal segmental glomerular sclerosis" (FSGS) is a disease entity, and "puromycin-aminonucleoside" (AMNS) and "protamine sulfate" (PS) are not diseases but rather chemicals used to induce the disease model. Therefore, the table above presents the disease entity "FSGS" and the two chemicals used to model the disease.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my mistake. Here's the updated table with only the valid disease entities:

| Disease |
| --- |
| FSGS |

In the paragraph, "focal segmental glomerular sclerosis" (FSGS) is the only disease entity mentioned.
